thread.section_title: The London NYC - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Fine Hotel for Family Visit
thread.title_full: Fine Hotel for Family Visit - Review of The London NYC, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Ruth S
title: Fine Hotel for Family Visit
text: The London was a great choice for our annual spring break trip with teenage grandchildren. Our American Express package included a generous breakfast buffet, free wi-fi, late checkout -- 4 pm, and two adjacent suites, one with twin beds for the teens. The rooms were comfortable and well-appointed -- fine bed linens, good pillows. All staff were friendly and accomodating, and the location was just right for our agenda of shopping, shows and museums.
